Posts.Content: Dec 4, 2017 02:29AM Jennytalia wrote: my friend Mary is young, only eats organic , does yoga and was the happiest most carefree person I know!  Guess what? Stage 3 cancer. If you can juice your cancer away that is wonderful, but for many people it is not the way. Sometimes, dirty pharma saves lives
Posts.Title: Family waiting daughter00 Jennytalia
